deleteConnection.title: Delete Connection
deleteConnection.line: This connection you are about to delete is used in
deleteConnection.line2: {{projects}} projects, {{running}} of them are currently running.
deleteConnection.line3: Deleting the connection may cause failure of projects.
deleteConnection.line4: Are you sure you want to delete this connection?

deleteTrigger.title: Delete {{name}} Trigger
deleteTrigger.line: This trigger you are about to delete uses:
deleteTrigger.line3: Deleting the trigger may cause failure of project.
deleteTrigger.line4: Are you sure you want to delete this trigger?

deleteVariable.title: Delete Variable
deleteVariable.line: This variable you are about to delete uses:
deleteVariable.line3: Deleting the variable may cause failure of projects.
deleteVariable.line4: Are you sure you want to delete this variable?

deleteFile.title: Delete {{name}}
deleteFile.line: You will not be able to recover it.

deleteDeployment.title: Delete this deployment?
deleteDeployment.line: You will not be able to recover it
